string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: I can’t pair with the base
I can’t pair with the sleep tracker
I can’t pair with the mattress pump
Can’t detect movement feedback on one or both sides

string-array.name: answers
string-array.item: Turn bluetooth on your smartphone and ensure the base is connected to a power outlet. Reset the base by unplugging the power cord from the power outlet for 1 minute. Plug it back in and re-pair the base using the Sleepsense app.

Turn bluetooth on your smartphone and ensure that the two Beddit cords are connected to a power outlet. To reset the Beddit tracker, unplug the USB end of both the cords from Beddit\'s power adapter for 1 minute. Plug it back in and place your phone on the side of the bed you sleep on most frequently. Re-pair the two devices using the Sleepsense app. Follow the setup procedure one person at a time to ensure that your Sleepsense bed and smart device are paired correctly.

Connect the air hose marked ‘L’ for left side to the outlet on the pump marked ‘L’, and do the same for the ‘R’ right side hose, ensuring there are no kinks or pinch points. Connect the pump to the power outlet and turn the power on.

Stop movement feedback, leave movement off for 30 seconds before starting movement feedback again. If this doesn’t work, go to the settings section and select ‘reset app’ to go through onboarding again and re-pair with all devices.
